name: INGetVisualCodeIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The response didnt specify a code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You’re ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case continueInApp
items.desc: You must launch the app to display the visual code.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: You’re in the process of generating the code but aren’t yet finished.

items.name: case success
items.desc: You successfully generated the visual code.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to generate the visual code.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app to request the visual code.

items.name: case failureAppConfigurationRequired
items.desc: Your app wasn’t configured to display visual codes.
